entry.title: JS get URL parameter
entry.content:
function getQueryVariable(variable){        var query = window.location.search.substring(1);        var vars = query.split("&");        for (var i = 0; i < vars.length; i++) {            var pair = vars[i].split("=");            if(pair[0] == variable){                return pair[1];            }        }        return(false);}// call// url://localhost/index.html/?id=1&img=a.pnggetQueryVariable("id") // 1getQueryVariable("img") // a.png

source: http://runoob.com/w3cnote/js-get-url-param.html
